DescriptionData.Title: Tramp Bald Wig w/ Long Grey Hair
DescriptionData.Description:
Long wavy bald wig, can be trimmed to desired length. Beige nylon cap, adjustable sizing band. Remember, just apply your own clown makeup to the cap for a perfect match! By Lacey.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Long wavy bald wig
Can be trimmed to desired length
Adjustable sizing band

DescriptionData.Title: Alicia Karmae Wigs
DescriptionData.Description:
This adorable wig has straight bangs and curly sides. It looks like ponytails, but it's actually all one piece - the look comes from the shape of the underlying wig cap. Available in various colors with little purple flowers. By Alicia.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Adorable wig has straight bangs and curly sides
It looks like ponytails, but it's actually all one piece - the look comes from the shape of the underlying wig cap
Lots of room in the cap, so it's great if your natural hair is really long

DescriptionData.Title: Lacey Pebbles Wigs (Top-Knot)
DescriptionData.Description:
A short, wavy, rust-orange wig with a 6-8 inch high top-knot, like the famous cavegirl. The top-knot is wrapped around a (replaceable) yellow bone at the base and has wires in it allowing you to change the shape. By Lacey.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: A short, wavy, rust-orange wig with a 6-8 inch high top-knot, like the famous cavegirl
The top-knot is wrapped around a yellow bone at the base and has wires in it allowing you to change the shape
Perfect for your Pebbles Flintstone costume

DescriptionData.Title: Party Page Wig - Sunshine
DescriptionData.Description:
Straight wig, just to the top of the shoulders, with bangs and a slight turn under. Can be teased and fluffed for fullness, and it looks good with 1 or 2 small ponytails on top. Has a mesh cap with adjustable sizing band. By WestBay.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Straight orange/yellow streaked wig
Length is just to the top of the shoulders, with bangs and a slight turn under
Can be teased and fluffed for fullness

DescriptionData.Title: Fun Flip Clown Wig - Red
DescriptionData.Description:
A fun short wig with an adorable flip at the ends, adds lots of character to your costume.
Before wearing, shake the wig and use a pick near the wig cap to lift the curls (don't pick all the way through, as this will alter the look of the curls). Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Short straight red wig
This fun short wig has an adorable flip at the ends
Can be teased and fluffed for fullness
Durable, comfortable, and easy to clean

DescriptionData.Title: Disco Curly Clown Wig - Royal Blue
DescriptionData.Description: Long curly clown wig with full loose curls. This clown wig is sleek and shiny long loose curls, with adjustable clips. Durable, comfortable, and easy to clean.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Long, royal blue wet look curly wig
Slightly larger cap of mesh for added air circulation and comfort
Has a mesh cap with adjustable sizing band

DescriptionData.Title: Disco Curly Clown Wig - Red
DescriptionData.Description: Long curly clown wig with full loose curls. This clown wig is sleek and shiny long loose curls, with adjustable clips. Durable, comfortable, and easy to clean.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Long, red wet look curly wig
Slightly larger cap of mesh for added air circulation and comfort
Has a mesh cap with adjustable sizing band

DescriptionData.Title: Cindy Wig - Sunshine Orange/Yellow
DescriptionData.Description:
Medium-length straight wig that curls below the bottom of the chin with bangs. It can be teased and fluffed for fullness, and it looks good with 1 or 2 small ponytails on top. Has a mesh cap with adjustable sizing band. By WestBay.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Medium-length straight yellow and orange wig that curls below the bottom of the chin and bangs
Has a mesh cap with adjustable sizing band

DescriptionData.Title: West Bay Hifro Super Afro Wigs - Rainbow
DescriptionData.Description:
Gigantic curly afro style rainbow wig. Not really for the professional clown, but ideal for characters and Halloween clowns, this sky high afro towers above the rest! By WestBay.
Before wearing, shake the wig and use a pick near the wig cap to lift the curls (don't pick all the way through, as this will alter the look of the curls). Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Super Afro Wig
By Westbay

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Woochie Clown Noses (Small)
DescriptionData.Description: Very lightweight rubber noses in matte light red. Especially great for hobo and character clowns. Can be applied with spirit gum, latex, etc. For best results, place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Very lightweight rubber nose
Apply grease/cream makeup to nose and set with powder to match makeup
Apply with spirit gum, latex, etc.
Place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape

DescriptionData.Title: H.J. Constellation Rhinestone Pins - Hobo Clown
DescriptionData.Description: Shy tramp clown with rhinestone flowers. Approximately 2.5 inches tall.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Colorful rhinestone pin
Approximately 2.5 inches tall

DescriptionData.Title: Forum Novelties Rubber Chicken Necklaces
DescriptionData.Description: Chicken necklaces never go out of style. Our thirty-six inch beaded necklace with three small rubber chickens attached is fun and silly. Beaded necklace with 3 mini rubber chickens attached. Fun silliness! 36" long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Beaded necklace with 3 mini rubber chickens attached
Gold-tone beads
36 inches long

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics Chicken Earrings
DescriptionData.Description: Gold-tone earrings made from tiny rubber chickens on French hooks. Chickens approximately 1.5" long
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cute earrings made from tiny rubber chickens on gold-tone French hooks
Chickens approximately 1.5" long

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics "IYQ2" Clown Badges
DescriptionData.Description: Engraved pins are a great way to get a message across or advertise. Assorted colors. Approximately 3 inches by 1 inch.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Engraved plastic pin
Approximately 3 inches by 1 inch

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics "IITYYOMAH" Clown Badges
DescriptionData.Description: But what does it mean? If I Tell You, You Owe Me A Hug! Engraved pins are a great way to get a message across or advertise. Assorted colors. Approximately 3 inches by 1 inch.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Engraved plastic pin
Approximately 3 inches by 1 inch

DescriptionData.Title: Alicia Two-Tone Curl Wigs - Orange/Yellow
DescriptionData.Description:
Beautiful layered curly wig in Neon Orange and Yellow. A Clown Antics exclusive! By Alicia.
Before wearing, shake the wig and use a pick near the wig cap to lift the curls (don't pick all the way through, as this will alter the look of the curls). Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Beautiful layered curly wig
Adjustable sizing band
Remember, just apply your own clown makeup to the cap for a perfect match!

DescriptionData.Title: The New Punk- Light/Dark Blue
DescriptionData.Description:
The New Punk is a poofy wig with spiked up hair and plenty of volume that brushes your shoulders. The ends are silky smooth and feathered. By WestBay.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Spiked up hair and plenty of volume that brushes your shoulders
Silky smooth, feathered ends
Light/Dark Blue

DescriptionData.Title: Peter Alan Small Raggedy Andy Wigs
DescriptionData.Description: Bright red yarn attached to a slightly smaller red cloth cap.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Bright red yarn wig in a boys style
Fits kids and small adults
Solid cloth cap

DescriptionData.Title: Lacey Deluxe Raggedy Andy Wigs - Red
DescriptionData.Description: High quality red yarn attached in layers on a breathable mesh cap. By Lacey.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: High quality, boys style red yarn wig
Breathable mesh cap

DescriptionData.Title: Deluxe Raggedy Ann Wig - Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: High quality yarn attached in layers on a breathable mesh cap. By Lacey.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: High quality golden yellow yarn wig with pony tails
Breathable mesh cap

DescriptionData.Title: Enigma Wigs Women's Raggedy Cleo, Red, One Size
DescriptionData.Description: A nice yarn wig with a red cloth cap. This is a very full wig for a classic rag doll look. By Alicia.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: High quality, shoulder-length red yarn wig
Solid cloth cap

DescriptionData.Title: Polly Products Company 18" Traveling Wig Stands
DescriptionData.Description: Handy folding metal wig stand packs flat when not in use! Perfect for drying or storage of your longer wigs, this wire wig stand easily snaps together and apart for travel. Allows air to circulate for quick drying. Minimal assembly required. Approximately 18 inches tall when assembled.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Handy folding metal wig stand packs flat when not in use
Great for travelling, and also for drying your wig - lets air flow through!
Approximately 18 inches tall when assembled
Some assembly required

DescriptionData.Title: Polly Products Company 12" Traveling Wig Stands
DescriptionData.Description: Handy folding metal wig stand packs flat when not in use! Great for travelling, and also for drying your wig - lets air flow through! Approximately 12 inches tall when assembled.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Handy folding metal wig stand packs flat when not in use
Great for travelling, and also for drying your wig - lets air flow through!
Approximately 12 inches tall when assembled
Some assembly required

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Flesh Colored Latex Bald Caps
DescriptionData.Description:
Latex Woochie Bald Cap from Mehron gives you the completely bald look. Glue to skin with Spirit Gum, and cover the edge with Liquid Latex. For a more realistic look, add makeup or Crepe Hair as desired.
Instructions, adhesives, removers and makeup not included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Professional Latex Bald Cap by Woochie
Gives a realistic bald look
Adhesive and makeup sold separately

DescriptionData.Title: Short Tramp Bald Wig - Brown
DescriptionData.Description:
Short straight bald wig, just to the bottom of the chin. Off-white nylon cap, adjustable sizing band. Remember, just apply your own clown makeup to the cap for a perfect match! By Lacey.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Short straight bald wig, just to the bottom of the chin
Off-white nylon cap
Order Brown to wear under darker wigs
One size fits most
Brown
